name: BOWL SHIBARIUM
additional_notices: Kindly be aware of liquidity-related risks. This notice is not directed at any project in particular, and is more of a cautionary reminder.

The following token has a variable tax function on the smart contract to change tax rates post deployment.
Do your own research and be careful if you are trading this token.

description.en: OWL ($BOWL) is an ERC20 token inspired by the success of Shiba Inu ($SHIB) and its call to “increased decentralization” within the Defi space. Built by a team that believes in the power of decentralization, BOWL integrates meme and “upcoming” utility. BOWL strives to be an integral part of the ever-growing and widely successful Shiba Inu ecosystem. Drawing inspiration from $SHIB's call for increased decentralization, BOWL will attempt to build the most powerful and elegant peer-to-peer lending protocol that unlocks value for even the smallest portfolio
